Package com.newsalligator.userinterface

Class UIManager

java.lang.Object
com.newsalligator.userinterface.UIManager
public class UIManager extends Object

UIMangager

The UIManager class is a class to manage to user interface, including switching scenes, maintaining history, and initializing the UI components.
Author:
Khanh Nguyen, Phong Au
